item.title: Try Try
item.description: Who Know It’s another kind of waste. simplify to the logic of state transfer object & connection/field/force from a list to another list from fact/news to insight and knowledge from raw materials to products from electronics to intelligence/robot the evolution of technology and society. a matter of flow rather than inventory static/dynamic view what can you contribute to the process between transfer/transform make a better chart does not make it more meaningful but you can trace back to the tedious life?
